Package ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics

Interface Summary
AView<AModel> All Views implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
AModel<V extends AView> This is a generic Model class.
BitmapJsonConverter Provides custom base64 serialization / deserialization for Bitmaps.
BrowseActivity BrowseActivity is responsible for mainly handling the load of the comments.
BrowseView BrowswView is responsible for loading the view of the comments.
BrowseView.Holder Basic holder for the BrowseView containing comment parameteres.
Cache Cache is what is responsible for saving and loading data to and from the user's device.
CacheIO  
CommentController The CommentController class is what helps distinguish between a new reply or a new top level comment.
CommentListModel CommentListModel holds the sorting data and the functions to add a comment within the list.
CommentManager  
CommentModel CommentModel is the actual model for each and every comment.
CommentPull  
CommentPush  
CommentRetriever  
CommentSearch CommentSearch is used with respect to ElasticSearch and is called upon to help in matching string queries to/from the server for sorting.
CommentSort  
CreateCommentActivity Called when a user hits the '+' button at the top of any screen that has one.
EditCommentActivity EditCommentActivity is called when a user is in the "My Comments" activity and selects that he/she wishes to edit a comment by clicking on it.
EditMyProfileActivity  
ElasticSearchResponse<T> The ElasticSearchResponse helps in getting the correct source data for each comment.
ElasticSearchSearchResponse<T> Responsible for getting the hits to a reference to a comment and gets the source of each comment from the CommentListController.
GeoTopicsApplication This is a collection of singletons.
HelpActivity  
Hits<T> Hits returns the score and hits from an ElasticSearch response.
InspectCommentActivity This source file holds the methods for the CreateCommentActivity as well as the EditCommentActivity.
InspectOtherProfilesActivity  
InspectProfileActivity  
ManualLocationActivity This class file is loaded if the user is not running Google API and thus cannot pick a location on the map.
MapsActivity This file is activated once the user selects that he/she wishes to manually set a location.
MyBookmarksActivity  
MyCommentsActivity Shown when a user clicks on "My Comments" from the start screen of the application In this activity, the user will be shown all of his/her comments including both top-level and reply comments.
MyFavouritesActivity  
ProfilePush  
ProfileSearch  
ReplyLevelActivity The view you see when you go to view the replies once you click a top level comment and click a reply.
StartActivity Contains data for the start screen of the application.
TopLevelActivity The view you see when you go to "Browse" from the start screen.
User Holds all the data that the individual user whom is using the application creates/modifies.
UserController  
UserIO  
UserLocationServices
